required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Biomarker Analyses in Hepatocellular Carcinoma (HCC) Patients Treated With TheraSphere®
clinical_study.official_title: Biomarker Analyses in Hepatocellular Carcinoma Patients Treated With Therasphere®

brief_summary.textblock: To analyze specific angiogenic, inflammatory and immune profiles in hepatocellular carcinoma patients who undergo radioembolization.

detailed_description.textblock: Patients who have planned lobar radioembolization (TheraSphere (TS)) and consent to this study will have peripheral blood samples collected pre-TS, post-TS, 4 hours post-TS, 24 hours post-TS, 3 days post-TS, 7 days post-TS and 30 days post-TS to analyze specific angiogenic, inflammatory and immune profiles.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage change in angiogenic, inflammatory and immune biomarkers
primary_outcome.description: The percent of change at 7 different timepoints for the following biomarkers will be calculated: Ang-2, FGFb, HB-EGF, HGF, PDGF-BB, PIGF, SDF-1, VEGF, VEGFC, IFNg, IL-1a, IL-1b, IL-2, IL-4, IL-6, IL-8, IL-10, IL-12p70, TNFa trimer, CRP, TGFb1, EGFR, PD-1, PD-L1, CD45RA, CD127, HLA-DR, CD62L, CD3, CD8, CD197, CCR7, CD45RO, PD-L2, FOXP3, Perforin, Granzyme, TIA-1, CD14, CD107a, CD25, CD45, CD4, CD20 and CD56+16.

secondary_outcome.description: Alphafetoprotein will be measured in ng/mL.
Lesions will be measured using mRECIST.
Time-to-progression will be measured in days.
Overall survival will be measured in days.

arm_group.description: HCC patients treated with radioembolization. Plasma collection will be performed at 7 timepoints in relation to treatment.

intervention.description: We will be collecting plasma at 7 different timepoints in hepatocellular carcinoma patients that are treated with radioembolization.

biospec_descr.textblock: Any leftover patient plasma samples collected for this study will be retained for future research which may or may not involve genetic testing.

study_pop.textblock: Patients diagnosed with hepatocellular carcinoma who will be receiving lobar TheraSphere radioembolization.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Must have the diagnosis of HCC (biopsy or imaging criteria)
- Must have planned lobar TheraSphere treatment
- Must be able to give consent
- Must have an ECOG (Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group) performance status of ≤ 2
- Must have a life expectancy of ≥ 3 months
- Women must not be pregnant with an acceptable contraception in premenopausal women
- Must be > 4 weeks since prior radiation
- Must be > 2 weeks since liver surgery
- Must be ≥ 2 weeks post radiosensitizing chemotherapy or > 6 weeks since prior BCNU (carmustine) or Mitomycin-C
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients are excluded if they do not meet the inclusion criteria
